name: Act of Heroism
oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.
flavor_text:
"On every plane, there are those who run toward danger."
—Gideon Jura

name: Aerial Guide
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Aerial Guide attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Kefnet taught us to turn obstacles into advantages."
—Neponem, vizier of Kefnet

name: Ambuscade
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "Spent a lifetime learning from predators. Picked up a few tricks."

name: Aven of Enduring Hope
oracle_text:
Flying
When Aven of Enduring Hope enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "This storm will calm. We must believe that."

name: Aven Reedstalker
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
flavor_text: "Our best chance against the Eternals will be tactics they've never seen and styles they've never trained in."

name: Beneath the Sands
oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Though buried and muffled, nature's whisper still called to Nissa.

name: Bitterbow Sharpshooters
oracle_text: Vigilance, reach
flavor_text:
"Remember, brother, the eyes are always vulnerable."
"I never forgot."

name: Blur of Blades
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Blur of Blades deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: Samut battled her way through the hordes, shouting the names of those who'd died in her crop and those she hoped yet to save.

name: Brambleweft Behemoth
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: Life will find a way, or it will make one.

name: Carrion Screecher
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The banished have come home to roost.

name: Cinder Barrens
oracle_text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavor_text:
"I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Countervailing Winds
oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The Eternals had long since mastered every technique taught during the trials.

name: Crash Through
oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"We have to get out of the city, Djeru. All of us! Gather as many as you can."
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Cunning Survivor
oracle_text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Cunning Survivor gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Initiates who had been through the Trial of Knowledge learned to see everything as pieces of a larger puzzle.

name: Dauntless Aven
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Dauntless Aven attacks, untap target creature you control.
flavor_text: In the chaos brought by the new gods, swift-winged aven served as pathfinders, leading the last of the people away from the ruins of Naktamun.

name: Defiant Khenra
flavor_text: There were those who saw the death of the gods and the city's collapse as a final test of worth. Some believed it meant the God-Pharaoh had been killed. Only a few realized they had been deceived.

name: Desert of the Fervent
oracle_text:
Desert of the Fervent enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Desert of the Glorified
oracle_text:
Desert of the Glorified enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Desert of the Indomitable
oracle_text:
Desert of the Indomitable enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
Cycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Desert of the Mindful
oracle_text:
Desert of the Mindful enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Desert of the True
oracle_text:
Desert of the True enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Disposal Mummy
oracle_text: When Disposal Mummy enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor_text: Without the viziers to oversee their actions, some anointed went to extreme lengths to fulfill their directives.

name: Djeru's Renunciation
oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text:
"I was promised an afterlife, not this. Samut was right. The God-Pharaoh lied."
—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Dutiful Servants
flavor_text: Buildings crumbled and monuments fell. The river bled and the sky wept tears of fire. All the while, servants silently continued their work, oblivious to it all.

name: Feral Prowler
oracle_text: When Feral Prowler dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: Once favored companions, many cats were left to fend for themselves.

name: Firebrand Archer
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Firebrand Archer deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: A word of vengeance, and her arrows awaken in flame.

name: Frilled Sandwalla
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Frilled Sandwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: It basks atop the rubble of Rhonas's monument, which still pulses with latent power.

name: Frontline Devastator
oracle_text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
{1}{R}: Frontline Devastator gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The God-Pharaoh's benevolence concealed the factory he created to produce an army of Eternals.

name: Gift of Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor_text: "What greater testament can there be to Rhonas's lessons?"

name: Gilded Cerodon
oracle_text: Whenever Gilded Cerodon attacks, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The plating of its horns is a token of honor from Hazoret, who favors creatures with great hearts.

name: God-Pharaoh's Faithful
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a blue, black, or red spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "This is the final trial! Rejoice, for the God-Pharaoh soars among us!"

name: Granitic Titan
oracle_text:
Menace
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text:
"That one's not mine. Run!"
—Nissa Revane

name: Graven Abomination
oracle_text: Whenever Graven Abomination attacks, exile target card from defending player's graveyard.
flavor_text: Ironically, the statues had been constructed as a warning.

name: Grisly Survivor
oracle_text: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Grisly Survivor gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: No cartouches to earn. No afterlife to enter. Only the glory of a well-struck blow and the growing pile of felled enemies at her feet.

name: Harrier Naga
flavor_text: She trusts that the potent poisons of her darts will reach the enemy before the enemy reaches her.

name: Khenra Eternal
oracle_text: Afflict 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.)
flavor_text: For many years, servant mummies toiled in the mines to extract lazotep. The emergence of the Eternals revealed the sacred substance's true purpose.

name: Khenra Scrapper
oracle_text:
Menace
You may exert Khenra Scrapper as it attacks. When you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor_text: "There is no tomorrow, so hold nothing back."

name: Kindled Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: The minotaur stared at the Eternal bearing down on him—the embodiment of deadly skill he had aspired to become.

name: Lethal Sting
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Initiates once believed defeat was the worst fate possible—a sentiment they quickly abandoned.

name: Life Goes On
oracle_text: You gain 4 life. If a creature died this turn, you gain 8 life instead.
flavor_text:
"If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Lurching Rotbeast
oracle_text: Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The dead that swept across Naktamun came in all shapes and sizes.

name: Manalith
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"Though the afterlife, the city, and even the God-Pharaoh himself were one great deception, the ideals championed by the gods remain true."
—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Marauding Boneslasher
oracle_text: Marauding Boneslasher can't block unless you control another Zombie.
flavor_text: With the Hekma destroyed, the wandering dead that sought entrance to Naktamun had free rein to lay waste to the city.

name: Moaning Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Before the monuments, before the first trials, before Naktamun itself, Bolas culled the plane of its adults in order to rebuild it for his own designs.

name: Mummy Paramount
oracle_text: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, Mummy Paramount gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It appears some mummies have begun to observe a hierarchy all their own."
—Elekh, vizier of embalming

name: Oasis Ritualist
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}, Exert Oasis Ritualist: Add two mana of any one color. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor_text: "It's only the end if we allow it."

name: Oketra's Avenger
oracle_text: You may exert Oketra's Avenger as it attacks. When you do, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to it this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor_text: "Oketra's arrow is my spear, and her love my shield."

name: Open Fire
oracle_text: Open Fire deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Some khenra archers fashion their arrows with a personal touch.

name: Proven Combatant
oracle_text: Eternalize {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "It's not wise to keep glory waiting."

name: Puncturing Blow
oracle_text: Puncturing Blow deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text:
"Neither the false God-Pharaoh nor his bugs will decide our fate."
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Rampaging Hippo
oracle_text:
Trample
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text:
"Respect is earned through deeds—or the capacity to bite someone in half."
—Sana, former Ahn-crop initiate

name: Rhonas's Stalwart
oracle_text: You may exert Rhonas's Stalwart as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
flavor_text: "Give me some room."

name: Ruin Rat
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Ruin Rat dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor_text: From every shadow came the dull scratch of teeth on bones.

name: Sandblast
oracle_text: Sandblast deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: The sands of Amonkhet can be as much a boon as a bane. It depends entirely on which way the wind blows.

name: Scrounger of Souls
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Yell for help, and that may answer.

name: Seer of the Last Tomorrow
oracle_text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target player mills three cards.
flavor_text: "The truth? It's been here all along. The Hours as we understood them are lies."

name: Sidewinder Naga
oracle_text: As long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, Sidewinder Naga gets +1/+0 and has trample.
flavor_text:
"Those who embrace the harsh land rather than fight it find they have a powerful ally."
—Nissa Revane

name: Solitary Camel
oracle_text: Solitary Camel has lifelink as long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Deserts are inhospitable, not uninhabitable.

name: Spellweaver Eternal
oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
flavor_text:
"They were once our brothers and sisters."
—Etha, former Rhet-crop initiate

name: Steadfast Sentinel
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Eternalize {4}{W}{W} ({4}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Cleric with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

name: Strategic Planning
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Bolas remade this place in his image. He has the advantage here. We must approach carefully."
—Jace Beleren

name: Striped Riverwinder
oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The denizens of the Luxa River woke angry on the currents of blood.

name: Survivors' Encampment
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "What will happen to us?" they asked. The vizier paused. "I think . . . I think that's up to us now."

name: Thorned Moloch
oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Thorned Moloch has first strike as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text: Those who fled the destruction of the city stumbled into the territory of their prickly neighbors.

name: Torment of Venom
oracle_text: Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature. Its controller loses 3 life unless they sacrifice another nonland permanent or discards a card.
flavor_text: The Scorpion God's sting sends venom strong enough to poison blood, bone, and spirit.

name: Tragic Lesson
oracle_text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Though Kefnet's followers feverishly searched his last words for some final riddle, they found only the gurgles of a dying god.

name: Traveler's Amulet
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"Why wander in search of a new home when the path is laid out before you?"
—Pytamun, former Nef-crop initiate

name: Unquenchable Thirst
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Unquenchable Thirst enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Skills mastered by initiates are preserved within cartouches, so Eternals remain adept at their preferred combat styles.

name: Wall of Forgotten Pharaohs
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Wall of Forgotten Pharaohs deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. Activate only if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard.

name: Without Weakness
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Woodland Stream
oracle_text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text:
"Bolas's power on this plane can't be absolute. Look around you."
—Nissa Revane

name: Wretched Camel
oracle_text: When Wretched Camel dies, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target player discards a card.
flavor_text: Perfectly adapted to cross the wastes in life, they bring the wastes with them in death.

name: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh
oracle_text: {4}{R}: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor_text: The God-Pharaoh's most devoted took it upon themselves to follow his example.
